name: auth0-alexa-authentication-sample
description: This sample illustrates how it's possible to achieve secure authentication on each interaction with Alexa. At a very high-level this shows how to issue a command to Alexa, receive a one-time use authentication code through a different medium, SMS or email, and then use that code to confirm the transaction through Alexa.

scripts.build: npm run-script pack && wt-bundle -o build/bundle.js src/runtimes/wrapper-webtask.js
